full_summary:
**Request for Information (RFI) - Secure Document Destruction Industry**

**Reference Number:** cb-129-62014018
**Solicitation Number:** 1000395992A
**Publication Date:** December 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Notice Type:** Request for Information
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Background:**
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking feedback from industry stakeholders, including Indigenous businesses and small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), to better understand the operations of the secure document destruction industry in Canada. This information will inform the development of a future Request for Proposal (RFP) for secure document destruction services.

**Objective:**
The objective of this RFI is to:

1.  Solicit feedback on the operational and security capabilities and practices of the secure document destruction industry, as detailed in the attached Sample RFP (Attachment A).
    
2.  Seek comments on the evaluation criteria outlined in the Sample RFP (Attachment A) to ensure that the CRA receives responsive bids and reduces potential problems when the eventual RFP is published.

**Submission Requirements:**
Responses to this RFI must be submitted in one of the following two formats:

*   **Written Responses:** Please submit written responses by email to the Contracting Authority by the tender closing date. The CRA requests that all sections of this document be answered concisely. Any information of a confidential or proprietary nature contained in a supplier's response should be clearly marked 'PROPRIETARY' or 'CONFIDENTIAL'.
    
*   **Verbal Responses:** Respondents must request a virtual individual session to provide verbal responses. This request must be made by email to the Contracting Authority before the RFI closing date.

**Contracting Authority:**
Marie-Claude Lepage
Email: marie-claude.lepage@cra-arc.gc.ca

**Access to Information:**
The RFI and all supporting documentation can be accessed at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27476/rfi\_e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/27476/rfi\_e.pdf)
